name: TheSilverSerpent’sCurse
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: silver serpent's curse
des: A once-prosperous kingdom has fallen under a curse, turning its people to stone. As the last of a royal bloodline, you must reclaim the throne by defeating the mythical Silver Serpent that holds the kingdom in its grip. Along your journey, gather allies, seek ancient artifacts, and make choices that determine whether you can break the curse, fall to its power, or embrace the dark magic for yourself. Drop us any feedback at support@stokedskills.com. We love to hear from our users!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
